item.title: VMware vCenter Troubleshooting Guide
item.description: vCenter Troubleshooting Guide Log Files Networking Manual Network Config DNS *** Flush DNS *** 1 2systemctl restart systemd–resolved.service 3 4systemctl restart dnsmasq HTTP Proxy Certificate Management Renew all vCenter Machine Certificates vLCM *** Cannot sync depot *** 1 2/var/log/vmware/vmware-updatemgr/vum-server/vmware-vum-server.log
